alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 29 at 12:45PM EST until January 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin and Western Clinton Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chill values will occur between 1 AM and 8 AM Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton
